item.title: उपनिषदां सूचिः
item.description:
उपनिषदां सूचिः

विस्तारः

The following upanishads are traceable to 3 sources –
Vedic upanishads mentioned in Muktikopanishad and those commented by Upanishad Brahma Yogin bhashyas (marked **), Adyar Library (marked A), and Sadhale’s upanishad mahAvAkya kosha (marked S). (Total 201 below)

– सुन्दरः
